title: Plague Inc: Evolved v0.7.5 Hotfix 3
description:
"Plague Inc: Evolved is a unique mix of high strategy and terrifyingly realistic simulation. Your pathogen has just infected 'Patient Zero' - now you must bring about the end of human history by evolving a deadly, global Plague whilst adapting against everything humanity can do to defend itself."

Changelog:

v0.7.5 Hotfix 3:
- Fixes gene selection in Official Scenario
- Increased the size of cure icons

v0.7.5 Hotfix 2:
- Simian flu 3D model re-positioned
- Tweaks to size of apes/humans in Disease screens.
- Tweaks to a few achievements
- Occasional lag on population par update fixed
- Colony position fixes
- Fixed drone movement when zooming in
- Increased speed of max speed in replay
- Fixed some XML errors

v0.7.5 Hotfix 1:
- Fixed black screen sometimes that could appear at end of Simian Flu game
- Updated so Gen-Sys labs appear in correct locations
- Sound bug on load
- Flashing on ape/human bars improved
- Interface errors where selection is slow
- Some XML errors

v0.7.5:
New additions
- New plague type - the Simian Flu from the Dawn of the Planet of the Apes movie!
- Added game trailer
Tweaks
- Updated games settings storage (improved it and fixed some issues)
- Main map mesh optimized
Fixes
- Fixed couple of broken achievements (Patient Who, Trojan Horse, Boomer)
- Spelling errors fixed
- Fixed some XML errors

For a more detailed changelog, see changelog.txt.
